meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of manganese carbonate, typically occurring as pink or rose-colored crystals.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a beautiful rhodochrosites specimen during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry store displayed a stunning necklace made of rhodochrosites.
meanings.sent3: The rhodochrosites crystals blushed when they heard they were going to be part of a royal crown.
meanings.sent4: The rhodochrosites sparkled like pink diamonds under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased the rare rhodochrosites in all their pink glory.

meanings.sent1: The mineral collection included various rhodochrosites from around the world.
meanings.sent2: The gemologist carefully examined the rhodochrosites under a magnifying glass.
meanings.sent3: The rhodochrosites gathered for a group photo, each one looking slightly different.
meanings.sent4: The rhodochrosites in the display case seemed to dance in unison.
meanings.sent5: The auction house auctioned off a set of rare rhodochrosites to eager bidders.
